fields.name: INDIVIDUAL LESSONS: 5 Hours
fields.description: Improve your English with this 5 hour lesson pack. Its use is unlimited in time, with no expiration date. Book each lesson at your own convience!

fields.name: INDIVIDUAL LESSONS: 10 Hours

fields.name: REDUCED GROUP: 1.5h/week
fields.description: Join a reduced group online with a maximum of 6 participants. Broad timetables available, including Saturdays. The rate will be charged monthly on your bank account. Free cancellation policy.
